holidays.title: National Read a Book Day
holidays.description: In a world deluged by technology, silence the noise and turn the pages for a while.

holidays.title: Telephone Tuesday
holidays.description: Officially a day notorious for surprisingly, more phone calls than usual.

holidays.title: Another Look Unlimited Day
holidays.description: Declutter, reuse, gift, sell or donate. Turn your unwanted junk into useful items.

holidays.title: Bonaire Flag Day
holidays.description: Let’s explore the rich history and cultural significance of Bonaire Flag Day.

holidays.title: Fight Procrastination Day
holidays.description: Join thousands across the country as we enter a glorious battle with the “later” syndrome.

holidays.title: Great Egg Toss Day
holidays.description: Buckle up — we are in for an egg-citing game this Great Egg Toss Day!

holidays.title: National Coffee Ice Cream Day
holidays.description: Caffeine and ice cream lovers unite to celebrate a combination that has swept the world!

holidays.title: National Sabrina Day
holidays.description: We honor all the Sabrinas around the world by honoring the name Sabrina.

holidays.title: Swaziland Independence Day
holidays.description: Let's prepare to sing and dance with the natives to celebrate Swaziland's independence from the British!

holidays.title: Bertie Carvel’s Birthday
holidays.description: Carvel was nominated for the Laurence Olivier Award for Best Actor in a Leading Role.

holidays.title: Gabriela Gonzalez’s Birthday
holidays.description: Gabriela is a fashionista and a social media sensation who promotes self-love.

holidays.title: Jane Addams’s Birthday
holidays.description: Did you know Jane Addams had a spinal defect that required surgery?

holidays.title: Katy Hearn’s Birthday
holidays.description: Katy Hearn started lifting weights even before it was “cool” for women to build muscle.

holidays.title: Roger Waters’s Birthday
holidays.description: According to this multi-talented English rock artist, the most valuable thing in life is discovering your gift.
